Colormap¶

class oct.Colormap(cmapLabel='hsv')¶

Bases: object

Generate an rgb frame from a greyscale using a chosen colormap

Methods

__init__([cmapLabel])

Initialize self.

apply(image[, weight, mask, cmap])

Apply a given specific colormap to input greyscale image

applyC2(image[, weight, mask])

Return a Uint-8 rgb image with CIECAM format .

applyCET_C2(image[, weight, mask])

Return a Uint-8 rgb image with CET_C2 format .

applyCIECAM02(image)

applyHsv(image[, weight, mask])

Return a Uint-8 rgb image with hsv format

formatOut(image)

Retutn Uint-8 numpy array

hsv2Rgb(hsv)

Convert hsv values to rgb.

showColorBar([offset, mode])

Generates colorbars for the chosen colormap
